testsuite.name: Scenario: Create link to Assignment

testcase.name: Given I set up the LTI consumer key and shared secret if not already done
When I launch random "basic-lti-launch-request" LTI request with role "Administrator" and outcome URL "default" and document target "window"
Then I am on the LTI Mapping Page
When I click the 'New Class' mapping button
And I create new class with random name
Then I am on the LTI Mapping Page
When I click the 'New Assignment' mapping button
And I create empty assignment with random name
Then I am on the LTI Mapping Page
When I click the 'Assignment' mapping button
Then I am on the Assignment Review Page
And I close the LTI Test Harness leftover windows
When I re-launch "basic-lti-launch-request" LTI request with role "Administrator" and outcome URL "default" and document target "window"
Then I am on the Assignment Review Page
And I close the LTI Test Harness leftover windows

testsuite.system-out: Scenario: Create link to Gradebook without outcome URL ?[90m# lti/LTIMapping.feature:94?[0m ?[32mWhen ?[0m?[32mI launch random "?[0m?[32m?[1mbasic-lti-launch-request?[0m?[32m" LTI request with role "?[0m?[32m?[1mAdministrator?[0m?[32m" and outcome URL "?[0m?[32m?[1m?[0m?[32m" and document target "?[0m?[32m?[1mwindow?[0m?[32m"?[0m ?[90m# TestHarnessSteps.runLtiRequest(String,String,String,String)?[0m ?[32mThen ?[0m?[32mI am on the LTI Mapping Page?[0m ?[90m# LTIMappingSteps.assertLtiMappingPage()?[0m # Create new class ?[32mWhen ?[0m?[32mI click the 'New Class' mapping button?[0m ?[90m# LTIMappingSteps.clickNewClassButton()?[0m ?[32mAnd ?[0m?[32mI create new class with random name?[0m ?[90m# AddMapleTAClassSteps.createNewClassWithRandomName()?[0m ?[32mThen ?[0m?[32mI am on the LTI Mapping Page?[0m ?[90m# LTIMappingSteps.assertLtiMappingPage()?[0m # Map to Gradebook ?[32mWhen ?[0m?[32mI click the 'Gradebook' mapping button?[0m ?[90m# LTIMappingSteps.clickGradebookButton()?[0m ?[32mThen ?[0m?[32mI am in the Gradebook?[0m ?[90m# GradebookSteps.verifyGradebookPage()?[0m ?[32mAnd ?[0m?[32mI close the LTI Test Harness leftover windows?[0m ?[90m# TestHarnessSteps.closeLeftoverWindows()?[0m # Resend the same values to ensure we are now taken directly to the Gradebook ?[32mWhen ?[0m?[32mI re-launch "?[0m?[32m?[1mbasic-lti-launch-request?[0m?[32m" LTI request with role "?[0m?[32m?[1mAdministrator?[0m?[32m" and outcome URL "?[0m?[32m?[1m?[0m?[32m" and document target "?[0m?[32m?[1mwindow?[0m?[32m"?[0m ?[90m# TestHarnessSteps.reRunLtiRequest(String,String,String,String)?[0m ?[32mThen ?[0m?[32mI am in the Gradebook?[0m ?[90m# GradebookSteps.verifyGradebookPage()?[0m ?[32mAnd ?[0m?[32mI close the LTI Test Harness leftover windows?[0m ?[90m# TestHarnessSteps.closeLeftoverWindows()?[0m
